edu.doane.dugal.dea.kits.dchrom

Class DoubleChromosome

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.doane.dugal.dea.Individual
      • edu.doane.dugal.dea.kits.dchrom.DoubleChromosome

  • public class DoubleChromosome
extends Individual
    Class representing a fixed-length chromosome of doubles.
    Version:
    12/10/2014
    Author:
    Mark M. Meysenburg

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DoubleChromosome()
      Default constructor.
      DoubleChromosome(DoubleChromosome other)
      Copy constructor.
      DoubleChromosome(int length, double lo, double hi, int fracDigits)
      Create a new DoubleChromosome with the specified length, range for each gene, and desired number of digits to output when the individual is turned into a string.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DoubleChromosome

        public DoubleChromosome()
        Default constructor. Create a shell of a DoubleChromosome.

      • DoubleChromosome

        public DoubleChromosome(int length,
                        double lo,
                        double hi,
                        int fracDigits)
        Create a new DoubleChromosome with the specified length, range for each gene, and desired number of digits to output when the individual is turned into a string.
        Parameters:
        length - Number of genes in the chromosome
        lo - Low value for each gene in the chromosome
        hi - High value for each gene in the chromosome
        fracDigits - Number of fraction digits to output

      • DoubleChromosome

        public DoubleChromosome(DoubleChromosome other)
        Copy constructor. Make this DoubleChromosome object deep-copy identical to the parameter.
        Parameters:
        other - DoubleChromosome to mimic

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • randomizeGene

        public final void randomizeGene(int gene)
        Randomize one of the genes in the chromosome, to a new value in the range specified by the individual's lo and hi values.
        Parameters:
        gene - Which gene in the chromosome to randomize.

      • getLength

        public int getLength()
        Get the length of this individual's chromosome.
        Returns:
        Number of doubles in this DoubleChromosome's array.

      • getGene

        public double getGene(int gene)
        Get the value of a certain gene in the chromosome.
        Parameters:
        gene - Which gene to get
        Returns:
        Value of the specified gene

      • setGene

        public void setGene(int gene,
                    double value)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Change the value of one of the genes in the chromosome.
        Parameters:
        gene - Which gene to change
        value - New value for the gene, in [lo, hi]
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If value is not in [lo, hi]
